# PED::GET_MOUNT

## Summary
Returns the ped index of the ped this ped is riding

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex

## Returns
* **PED_INDEX**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->

Function just returns 0
void __fastcall ped__get_mount(NativeContext *a1)
{

  v1 = a1;
